sloancone

SDSS conesearching tools via the CL or Python API. Return conesearch results, or simply check whether or not a location in the sky has been covered by SDSS.

v0.3.3
Star

sloancone.sdss_square_search module ∞

A first pass square search of SDSS using the conesearch radius as the diameter of the (on sky) square

Author

David Young

class sdss_square_search(log, ra, dec, searchRadius, galaxyType=False)[source] ∞

Bases: object

The worker class for the sdss_square_search module

Key Arguments

log – logger

  • ra – ra in sexigesimal or decimal degrees

  • dec – dec in sexigesimal or decimal degrees

  • searchRadius – search radius in arcsecs
